Room.Name: Barn
Room.ShortDescription: This is a small barn, filled from wall to wall with stacks of hay.
Room.LongDescription: Light filters in from between the poorly laid boards that make up the walls and ceiling. Huge farm tools lie scattered about, and dust and cobwebs mark the fact that no one has tended this farm in a long time. On the floor, partially obscured by hay, is a cellar door.
